tagline.zh: 加强非洲区块链的采用

introduce.en: EOSNAIROBI is a strong and vibrant community made up of individuals with different backgrounds who believe that blockchain technology will drive the future. A future where tools of wealth creation are decentralized and accessible to many, a future of transparency and accountability, a future where individuals and groups can participate in making the world a better place on an incentivized platform.
introduce.zh: EOSNAIROBI是一个强大且充满活力的社区，由不同背景的个人组成，他们相信区块链技术将推动未来发展。未来财富创造的工具是分散化的，许多人都可以使用，未来的透明度和问责制是未来，个人和团体可以参与使世界成为激励平台上更好的地方。
